QuestData.Title: Into Jaedenar
QuestData.Description: The Shadow Council corrupts this once beautiful forest from their stronghold, Jaedenar, in the northwest.$B$BNow, one of our own is missing. We sent a lone scout by the name of Andalar Shadevale to Jaedenar, in hopes of thinning the enemy's ranks by stealth. $B$BWe have not heard from him in days, and we fear the worst. There is a small chance he may still be alive. $n, please go at once and find him!
